com.espreccino.peppertalk

Class PepperTalk

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espreccino.peppertalk.PepperTalk

  • public class PepperTalk
extends Object
    PepperTalk single instance. Entry to Peppertalk API

      • init

        public PepperTalk.Builder init(String clientId,
                               String clientSecret,
                               String userId)
        Initiate Peppertalk.
        Parameters:
        clientId - - CLIENT_ID from the getpeppertalk dashboard
        clientSecret - - CLIENT_SECRET from the getpeppertalk dashboard
        userId - - User ID to registered the device with. All conversations will be initiated from this user.
        Returns:
        PepperTalk.Builder

      • chatWithParticipant

        public MessageRequest chatWithParticipant(String id)
        Initiate a conversation with an ID(user or group) groupId should start with "grp:"
        Parameters:
        id - user or group id for the participant
        Returns:
        returns MessageRequest object to initiate chat

                        String groupName,
                        String groupPic,

                        GroupCallback callback)
        Create a new group
        Parameters:
        groupId - - Group ID starting with "grp:"
        groupName - - Group Name
        groupPic - - Group Image as Url
        members - - List of group members
        callback - - GroupCallback GroupCallback

      • getParticipantUnreadCount

        public int getParticipantUnreadCount(String participantId,
                                     String topicId)
        Get unread count for participant(participantId) having a conversation in topic(topicId).
        Parameters:
        participantId - - user_id or group_id of the participant
        topicId - - topic_id of the conversation
        Returns:
        Integer count.

        Check if the GCM notification is from PepperTalk
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if notification from peppertalk false otherwise

      • handleNotification

                                  PepperTalk.NotificationBuilder notificationBuilder)
        Handle the notification intent.
        Parameters:
        intent - - Intent with notification data
        notificationBuilder - - PepperTalk.NotificationBuilder
        Returns:
        true if notification is handled, false otherwise

      • handleNotification

        public boolean handleNotification(android.content.Intent intent)
        Handle in app notification. NotificationBuilder must be set using setNotificationBuilder
        Parameters:
        intent - - Intent with notification data
        Returns:
        true if notification is handled, false otherwise
